ygData.subject: Re: Items of interest
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been buying rations and water.  I ve heard cheaper ways, and if someone can confirm them, please do tell, as I need to save money too. =) It s nice to
ygData.messageBody:
I've been buying rations and water. I've heard cheaper ways, and if someone
can confirm them, please do tell, as I need to save money too. =)

It's nice to have a game where you actually have to save your money.
Unlike those "other" games where it comes from trees.
*coughfinalfantasycough*

Tiresias
Paladin of Freeport
Servant of Erollisi Marr
----- Original Message -----
From: Rob and Deb Distante <senseirob@...>
To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, April 25, 1999 12:45 PM
Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: Items of interest


> From: Rob and Deb Distante <senseirob@...>
>
>
> > Date: Sun, 25 Apr 1999 07:08:38 -0400
> > From: "Dan Kassiday" <kassiday@...>
> >Subject: Re: Items of interest
> >
> >I have to ask since I am sick of fishcakes, Where do you get muffins?
>
> I buy them from Rashinda, in the Landholder's office in Freeport. Saves me
> a *lot* of money...
>
> BTW, is their *really* a reason to buy Rations, or especially Iron
Rations?
> They don't really seem to last longer than any other food item. I haven't
> timed this, and I haven't bought many of these Rations, but they just
don't
> seem to be worth the money.
>
> Lorimi, Cazic-Thule
>
